review: I purchased Chrome and found that it is really limited.  The only options are Netflix and YouTube.  No Hulu Plus or any other options.  I have 2 Apple TV's and I get 20+ options which include Netflix, YouTube, Hulu Plus, iTunes, my computer, my personal movies, and the list goes on.  If your interest is only YouTube and Netflix, then get it.  Otherwise, don't.
